messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Website request was Re: Bad day and it's	only 9.30am!!
messages.messageBody:
on 5/19/02 11:06 AM, Kinkade at kinkade@... wrote:

> <<"School is Dead, Learn in Freedom" website has quotes from Nobel Prize
winners
> who hated school and thought it was terrible and harmful. >>
>
> Could you please give us the link to this site?

http://www.learninfreedom.org/

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Website request was Re: Bad day and it's only 9.30am!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/19/02 9:07:11 AM, kinkade@nccs.ws writes:  ... Nobel Prize winners who hated school and thought it
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/19/02 9:07:11 AM, kinkade@... writes:

<< School is Dead, Learn in Freedom >>

>> Karl Bunday's "School is Dead, Learn in Freedom" website has quotes from
Nobel Prize winners who hated school and thought it was terrible and harmful.
>>

<<Could you please give us the link to this site?>>

Anytime you want to find a site, go to google.com and enter what you know. I
entered School is Dead, Learn in Freedom and got this:




Learn in Freedom! Education Reform, Home-Schooling Resources
... Learners who learn in freedom can learn foreign languages, world history,
and all
other knowledge necessary ... Education Reformers Who Say "School is Dead".
...
Description: Resources for unschoolers, homeschoolers, and all learners, with
or without school.
Category: Reference > Education > K through 12 > Home Schooling
learninfreedom.org/ - 18k - Cached - Similar pages

Colleges That Admit Homeschoolers FAQ (Learn in Freedom!)
... the Learn in Freedom!   TM page (http://learninfreedom.org). Thank you
for your
interest in the Colleges That Admit Homeschoolers FAQ. ... This School Is Dead
...
Description: Comprehensive guide to colleges that admit homeschooled
applicants and other college information for...
Category: Reference > Education > Colleges and Universities > Admissions
learninfreedom.org/colleges_4_hmsc.html - 50k - Cached - Similar pages
[ More results from learninfreedom.org ]


I could have gotten it with Karl Bunday too.


Google.com is WONDERFUL.


Sandra
